articles.title: Skip Disney, buy Mickey Mouse: Unlike adults, material things make kids happier than experiences, study finds - CNBC
articles.description: Material things give young children bursts of happiness and are better than experiential gifts because their memory is not fully developed, according to researchers at the University of Illinois, Chicago.
articles.content: If you're buying gifts for children this holiday season, you might be better off spending your money on a toy or material item over a trip to a theme park or other experience. A new study suggests th… [+2127 chars]
